description: This file defines a Flutter widget called PaddleIcon, which uses CustomPainter to draw a styled pickleball paddle icon with decorative elements. It includes a StatelessWidget for rendering and a CustomPainter subclass for the drawing logic.

classes.name: _PaddlePainter
classes.description: A CustomPainter subclass responsible for drawing the paddle icon, including the paddle head, handle, and decorative ball elements.

methods.name: PaddleIcon
methods.description: Constructor for the PaddleIcon widget, allowing customization of size and color with default values.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Build method that returns a CustomPaint widget with the specified size and painter.

methods.name: _PaddlePainter
methods.description: Constructor initializing the painter with a given color.

methods.name: paint
methods.description: Overridden method that performs the drawing of the paddle shape, handle, and decorative balls on the canvas.

methods.name: shouldRepaint
methods.description: Determines if the painter should repaint when the color changes.
